mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_user set uid = #{uid}, upw = #{upw}, nm = #{nm}, pic = #{pic}
mapper.delete: delete from t_user_follow where from_iuser = #{fromIuser} and to_iuser = #{toIuser}
mapper.select: select A.nm, A.created_at AS createdAt, A.pic, count(distinct B.ifeed) AS feedCnt, count(C.ifeed) AS favCnt, D.follower, D.following, D.followState from t_user AS A left join t_feed AS B on A.iuser = B.iuser left join t_favorite AS C on B.ifeed = C.ifeed inner join( select #{targetIuser} AS iuser , SUM(case when FROM_iuser = #{targetIuser} then 1 ELSE 0 END) AS following , SUM(case when to_iuser = #{targetIuser} then 1 ELSE 0 END) AS follower ,( sum(if(from_iuser = #{loginedIuser} and to_iuser = #{targetIuser},1,0)) + sum(if(from_iuser = #{targetIuser} and to_iuser = #{loginedIuser},2,0)) ) AS followState FROM t_user_follow ) AS D on A.iuser = D.iuser where A.iuser = #{targetIuser}
